title: Ep274 Prison Crimes
description:
This week, the gals chat about some incidents occurring while incarcerated. Topics include an infamous murderer's just desserts, the maze that is our criminal justice system, and the most ridiculous escape you've never heard of. Pop open a bottle of Winc's Atavist Merlot, paint your nectarines, and tune in for Prison Crimes.

For a full list of show sponsors, visit https://wineandcrimepodcast.com/sponsors/
